Class MovingImage

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
          java.awt.Rectangle
              MovingImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ball, Wall
public class MovingImage
extends java.awt.Rectangle

Represents an Image that can be moved in a Panel.

Author:
Yuta Arai
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

MovingImage

public MovingImage(java.lang.String filename,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int w,
                   int h)
Creates a default instance of a MovingImage with the filename of the image.

Parameters:
filename - - the name of the image file
x - - the x-value of the top left point of the Rectangle
y - - the y-value of the top left point of the Rectangle
w - - the width of the Rectangle
h - - the height of the Rectangle

MovingImage

public MovingImage(java.awt.Image img,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int w,
                   int h)
Creates a default instance of a MovingImage with the an image object.

Parameters:
img - - the Image used for the MovingImage
x - - the x-coordinate of the top left point of the Rectangle
y - - the y-coordinate of the top left point of the Rectangle
w - - the width of the Rectangle
h - - the height of the Rectangle

moveByAmount

public void moveByAmount(int x,
                         int y)
Moves the image by a specific amount.

Parameters:
x - - the amount the image will be moved in the x direction
y - - the amount the image will be moved in the y direction
